info.title: Unified Workflow Execution Engine
info.description: A clean, agnostic workflow execution engine PoC

get.description: Health check endpoint
Detailed health check
Detailed health check with error statistics
Health check specifically for monitoring components

post.description:
Create a WorkflowExecution and kick off execution by workflow id.

Supports both JSON and multipart/form-data payloads. For multipart, send:
- payload: JSON string for non-file fields (trigger, user/session/org ids)
- files[]: attachments for chat/file triggers

get.description: Simple streaming endpoint that polls DB for the latest execution of the workflow and streams status updates.

post.description: Save a workflow configuration to the database

get.description: Get a workflow configuration by ID
List all saved workflows returning ORM entities

post.description: Create a new workflow using SQLModel and return the SQLModel entity.

get.description: Get a workflow by ID using SQLModel and return the SQLModel entity.

post.description: Execute a workflow with an uploaded file

get.description: Get the status of a workflow execution
Get the detailed results of a workflow execution
Get execution analytics and history

post.description: Create a new workflow execution using SQLModel and return ORM entity

get.description: Get execution details using SQLModel and return ORM entity
List executions using SQLModel and return ORM entities

schema.title: Response List Executions Sqlmodel Executions Sqlmodel  Get

post.description:
Register a new step function.

This enables RPC-like step registration where clients can
register custom step functions that can be called during workflow execution.

get.description: List all registered step functions
Get information about a specific step type

post.description:
Upload a file and optionally trigger workflow processing.

This endpoint handles file uploads and can automatically trigger
workflow execution if a workflow_id is provided and auto_process is True.

get.description: Get Prometheus metrics
Get trace data for debugging
Get monitoring system summary
Get execution analytics and history
Get error analytics and statistics

schema.title: Response List Prompts Agents Prompts Get
Response List Agent Tools Agents  Agent Id  Tools Get
Response Available Tools Agents Available Tools Get

post.description:
Execute a single agent directly.

Accepts JSON or multipart/form-data. For multipart:
- payload: JSON string with { query: str, context?: dict }
- files[]: optional attachments (images/docs/audio). Audio will be flagged for transcription.

get.description:
List all tools (DB + in-process) as ToolRead objects.
DB entries take precedence on name collisions.
Get a tool by name as ToolRead. Prefers DB; falls back to registry.

schema.title: Response List Db Tools Tools Db Get
Response List Categories Tools Categories Get
